summary: Placide's dad tells him on his deathbed he'll haunt him if he doesn't find a woman soon. When he accidentally enters a photo shoot, Placide meets Sarah.
cast: Urbanus|Bea Van Der Maat|Willeke van Ammelrooy|Herbert Flack|Jan Decleir|Ann Petersen|Henri Garcin|Koen Crucke|Philippe Kerjean|Isabelle Soimaud|Leontine Nelissen|Marc-Henri Wajnberg|Chris Cauwenbergs|Romain Deconinck|Katrien Devos|Yvonne Verbeeck|Fred Van Kuyk|George Arrendell|Jan Hammenecker|Dagmar Liekens|Gerda Marchand|Désiré Naessens|Edward Reyntjens|Tom Van der Mussele|Alex Van Haecke|Mies Meulders|Alain Van Goethem|Willy Vandermeulen|Mandus de Vos
director: Directors: Stijn Coninx, Jef Van de Water
title: Koko Flanel
